page.title: 16THE BOXING DAY SWIM
page.content: In Alnwick there is a swimming club called Alnwick Dolphins. Their custom is that they swim in the sea on Boxing Day at Alnmouth. Before we go in to swim we have a game of football, rounders and hide the cracker. After we have played the games we go into the sea. Everyone goes into the sea. Some people just paddle but other people go right in and have a proper swim. The sea is very cold at that time of year. After we have swum in the sea we go to a restaurant called The Schooner to have soup, sandwiches and coffee to get warmed up.
